forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around this morning. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 25F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low near -5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 24F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High near 30F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 17F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 17F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 17F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 37F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 12F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around -10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 14F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 22F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
